Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 12:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

Visibility: 24 km

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 11 with temperature falling to 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h. High 11 with temperature falling to 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and early afternoon. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h late in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
